text: Holly Smale (born 7 December 1981) is a British writer. She wrote the best- selling, award-winning series Geek Girl. Smale won the 2014 Waterstones Children's Book Prize. She was shortlisted for the Roald Dahl Funny Prize. She was recruited by a modelling agency at the age of 15. She modeled for 2 years before deciding to become a writer. Category:1981 births Category:Living people Category:English children's writers
title: Holly Smale
